languages.text: "Так точно, Ваша Светлость. С ними, как и со всеми прочими, проводятся мероприятия дознания. Мерзавцы отказывались подчиняться, так что их изолировали на отдельной платформе. Подлый народ эти инфернусы, — наверняка замешаны в этом!" {n}Капитан презрительно сплевывает.{/n}

"Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are undergoing interrogation like all the rest. The scum refused to comply, so they were isolated on a separate platform. The inferni are a rotten bunch, they must be involved in this!" {n}The captain spits contemptuously.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Так точно, Ваша Светлость. С ними, как и со всеми прочими, проводятся мероприятия дознания. Мерзавцы отказывались подчиняться, так что их изолировали на отдельной платформе. Подлый народ эти инфернусы, — наверняка замешаны в этом!" {n}Капитан презрительно сплевывает.{/n}

traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective1

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are undergoing interrogation like all the rest. The scum refused to comply, so they were isolated on a separate platform. The inferni are a rotten bunch, they must be involved in this!" {n}The captain spits contemptuously.{/n}
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective1

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are undergoing interrogation like all the rest. The scum refused to comply, so they were isolated on a separate platform. The inferni are a rotten bunch, they must be involved in this!" {n}The captain spits contemptuously.{/n}
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective1

languages.text: «Sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Les están interrogando, como a todos los demás. Esa escoria se ha negado a obedecer, así que los han incomunicado en otra plataforma. Los infernus están todos corruptos, ¡tienen que formar parte de todo esto!». {n}El capitán escupe con desprecio.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are undergoing interrogation like all the rest. The scum refused to comply, so they were isolated on a separate platform. The inferni are a rotten bunch, they must be involved in this!" {n}The captain spits contemptuously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Les están interrogando, como a todos los demás. Esa escoria se ha negado a obedecer, así que los han incomunicado en otra plataforma. Los infernus están todos corruptos, ¡tienen que formar parte de todo esto!». {n}El capitán escupe con desprecio.{/n}
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective1

languages.text: 「はい、陛下。彼らは他の者と同じように尋問を受けています。クズどもは応じないので、別の場所に隔離されました。インフェルニは腐りきった連中です。きっとこの件に関わっているに違いありません！」{n}中隊長は侮蔑的に吐き捨てた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are undergoing interrogation like all the rest. The scum refused to comply, so they were isolated on a separate platform. The inferni are a rotten bunch, they must be involved in this!" {n}The captain spits contemptuously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「はい、陛下。彼らは他の者と同じように尋問を受けています。クズどもは応じないので、別の場所に隔離されました。インフェルニは腐りきった連中です。きっとこの件に関わっているに違いありません！」{n}中隊長は侮蔑的に吐き捨てた。{/n}
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective1

languages.text: “没错，大人。他们和其他人一样，目前正在接受审讯。那群人渣不肯服从命令，所以我们把他们隔离在单独的平台上。控火行会的那些家伙都是群人渣，他们肯定和这件事情脱不开关系！”{n}上尉轻蔑地啐了口唾沫。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are undergoing interrogation like all the rest. The scum refused to comply, so they were isolated on a separate platform. The inferni are a rotten bunch, they must be involved in this!" {n}The captain spits contemptuously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没错，大人。他们和其他人一样，目前正在接受审讯。那群人渣不肯服从命令，所以我们把他们隔离在单独的平台上。控火行会的那些家伙都是群人渣，他们肯定和这件事情脱不开关系！”{n}上尉轻蔑地啐了口唾沫。{/n}
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective1

languages.text: "Ja, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Sie werden befragt wie alle anderen. Das Gesindel wollte nicht kooperieren, also wurde es auf einer separaten Plattform isoliert. Die Inferni sind ein gottloser Haufen. Sie müssen in die Sache verstrickt sein!" {n}Der Captain spuckt verächtlich auf den Boden.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are undergoing interrogation like all the rest. The scum refused to comply, so they were isolated on a separate platform. The inferni are a rotten bunch, they must be involved in this!" {n}The captain spits contemptuously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ihr werdet befragt wie alle anderen. Das Gesindel wollte nicht kooperieren, also wurde es auf einer separaten Plattform isoliert. Die Inferni sind ein gottloser Haufen. Sie müssen in die Sache verstrickt sein!" {n}Der Captain spuckt verächtlich auf den Boden.{/n}
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective1

languages.text: « Oui, Votre Seigneurie. Ils subiront un interrogatoire comme tous les autres. Cette vermine a refusé de se soumettre, ils ont donc été isolés sur une plateforme séparée. Les inferni sont des ordures du pire acabit, ils sont forcément impliqués dans cette affaire ! » {n}Le capitaine crache avec mépris.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are undergoing interrogation like all the rest. The scum refused to comply, so they were isolated on a separate platform. The inferni are a rotten bunch, they must be involved in this!" {n}The captain spits contemptuously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oui, Votre Seigneurie. Ils subiront un interrogatoire comme tous les autres. Cette vermine a refusé de se soumettre, ils ont donc été isolés sur une plateforme séparée. Les inferni sont des ordures du pire acabit, ils sont forcément impliqués dans cette affaire ! » {n}Le capitaine crache avec mépris.{/n}
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective1

languages.text: "Evet, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Geri kalan herkes gibi onlar da soruşturmadan geçiyor. Şerefsizler itaate karşı geldikleri için ayrı bir platformda tutuluyorlar. İtfacılar, rezil rüsva takımından ibaretler. Bu işe bulaştıkları muhakkak!" {n}Kaptan, kibirle yere tükürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They are undergoing interrogation like all the rest. The scum refused to comply, so they were isolated on a separate platform. The inferni are a rotten bunch, they must be involved in this!" {n}The captain spits contemptuously.{/n}
